titleStmt.title: C. Brock and E. E. Garrett to James F. Robinson
CWG7803

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Mt. Sterling Ky. Nov 16th 1862
His Excellency
Hon. J. F. Robinson,

The office of Magistrate in this county in the 4th Magisterial District, knwown as the Jeffersonville district, Montgomery, is vacated by the resignation of John H. Stephens; and we hereby recommend John S. Shubart as his successor.

C. Brock, P. J. M. C. C.
E E Garrett clk M C C

Montgomery Co
J. P.
Dist No 4.
coms Issd Nov 24 1862
